chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
equal: fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
atomic: forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L
impH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
notH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
forallH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
lt_depth: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop

Goal:
forall (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), depth L (substituteFormula f v s) = depth L f

Premises:
Relations = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Relations : Language -> Set
substituteFormula = fun (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) => proj1_sig (substituteFormulaHelp f v s) : fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L Arguments substituteFormula _ _%nat_scope
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol
Notation Formula := (fol.Formula L)
Notation Terms := (fol.Terms L)
arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat
Trying to mask the absolute name "apply"! [masking-absolute-name,deprecated]
depth : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Functions = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Functions : Language -> Set
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat ->...-> Prop |- Type]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L ->...-> Prop |- Prop]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L ->...-> Prop |- Prop]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat ->...-> Prop |- Type]
Fin.eqb : Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t ?n -> bool where ?m : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L ->...-> Prop |- nat]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L ->...-> Prop |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- Type]
None : option ?A where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- Type]
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- Type]
Fin.F1 : Fin.t (S ?n) where ?n : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- nat]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- Type]
Fin.FS : Fin.t ?n -> Fin.t (S ?n) where ?n : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- nat]
Fin.L : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (?m + n) where ?m : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- nat]
Fin.to_nat : Fin.t ?m -> {i : nat | i < ?m} where ?m : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L lt_depth := fol.lt_depth L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop |- nat]
Fin.L_sanity : forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.L n p)) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) where ?m : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L ->...-> Prop |- nat]
substituteFormulaImp : forall f : fol.Formula L, (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> forall g : fol.Formula L, (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (impH f g)}
Formula_depth_rec2 : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (fol.impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (fol.notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, fol.lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (fol.forallH L v a)) -> forall a : fol.Formula L, P a
Formula_depth_ind2 : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (fol.impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (fol.notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, fol.lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (fol.forallH L v a)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Inductive Formula (L : Language) : Set := equal : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L | atomic : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L | impH : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L | notH : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L | forallH : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L Arguments fol.forallH _ _%nat_scope
substituteFormulaForall : forall (n : nat) (f : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth b (forallH n f) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (forallH n f)}
Formula_depth_rec2rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (fol.impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (fol.notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, fol.lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (fol.forallH L v a)) ->...-> P a
substituteFormulaNot : forall f : fol.Formula L, (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (notH f)}
substituteFormulaHelp : forall f : fol.Formula L, nat -> fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}
substituteFormulaImpNice : forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * fol.Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}, (forall q : nat * fol.Term L, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, substituteFormulaImp f z1 g z3 q = substituteFormulaImp f z2 g z4 q
substituteFormulaNotNice : forall (f : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * fol.Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, substituteFormulaNot f z1 q = substituteFormulaNot f z2 q
substituteFormulaForallNice : forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth b (forallH v a) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}), (forall (b : fol.Formula L) (q : lt_depth b (forallH v a)) (r : nat * fol.Term L), z1 b q r = z2 b q r) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, substituteFormulaForall v a z1 q = substituteFormulaForall v a z2 q
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> SProp), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
